original_text: After this he went down to Capernaum, he, and his mother, and his brethren, and his disciples: and they continued there not many days.
korean_text: 그 후에 예수께서 그 어머니와 형제들과 제자들과 함께 가버나움으로 내려가셨으나 거기에 여러 날 계시지는 아니하시니라

sentences.original_text: After this he went down to Capernaum
and they continued there not many days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 거기에 오래 머물지 않았습니다
